pages.text: The tales of Leprechauns harvesting wealth through pots of gold definitely had some truth in them. Having witnessed one being built by the leprechauns, I have written down the instructions on the next page. Once built, smacking it with the four leaf clover staff brings it to life. By itself, it doesn't do much yet, but for now just know that it's going to need some space surrounding it.
Right-click it with the clover staff to form the pot.
